questions.question: What is Spider-Man's real name?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man's real name is Peter Parker. He is a high school student who gains superhuman abilities after being bitten by a radioactive spider.

questions.question: Who is Spider-Man's first mentor in the MCU?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man's first mentor in the MCU is Tony Stark (Iron Man). Tony recruits Peter and provides him with a high-tech suit.

questions.question: What is the name of Spider-Man's AI assistant?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man's AI assistant is named Karen. She assists him with various tasks and provides information during his missions.

questions.question: Which actor portrays Spider-Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: Tom Holland portrays Spider-Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. His portrayal brings a youthful energy to the character.

questions.question: What is the name of the villain in Spider-Man: Homecoming?
questions.explanation: The villain in Spider-Man: Homecoming is Adrian Toomes, also known as Vulture. He is played by Michael Keaton.

questions.question: Which city does Spider-Man primarily protect?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man primarily protects the city of New York. It is his hometown and the setting for many of his adventures.

questions.question: Who becomes Spider-Man's best friend and eventually becomes the superhero Ned Leeds?
questions.explanation: Ned Leeds, portrayed by Jacob Batalon, becomes Peter Parker's best friend and later discovers Peter's secret identity as Spider-Man.

questions.question: Which film features Spider-Man's first appearance in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man makes his first appearance in the Marvel Cinematic Universe in the film 'Captain America: Civil War' (2016).

questions.question: Who is Spider-Man's love interest in the MCU?
questions.explanation: Spider-Man's love interest in the MCU is MJ (Michelle Jones), played by Zendaya.

questions.question: What is the name of the artificial intelligence glasses given to Peter by Tony Stark?
questions.explanation: EDITH (Even Dead, I'm The Hero) is the name of the artificial intelligence glasses given to Peter by Tony Stark in Spider-Man: Far From Home.
